TopicTitle: KSP2 would benefit from a built in pop-up window manager API for modders to utilize

Articles.Content: No more click through, no more type through, no more guessing where focus is, no more mod guessing which window is above or below it.  And most importantly, no more windows opening at the same place on the screen as the only other window already open.
Hello! We recently created a new KSP 2 Suggestions & Development Discussion section, so we'll be moving all related posts (including this one) over there.
